duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in creating and maintaining Cognos Reports.
Provide technical support to Cognos users, including answering questions, troubleshooting problems, and providing training.
Work with other IT staff to ensure the smooth operation of the Cognos environment.
Stay up to date on the latest Cognos releases and updates.
Identify and implement new ways to improve the Cognos support process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
